channel.title: Riccardo M. Cefala
channel.description: Recent content on Riccardo M. Cefala

item.title: Home
item.description: Ciao. I am Riccardo. This is my website. Here I try to be authentic, keep it simple, and write about things that make me happy. You are a welcome guest. If you feel like, you can send me an email. This is a picture of me I like. My wife took it in 2016. We were visiting New York. I code and build clouds. Once I helped build one that sold for a lot of money.
